TextEng: I would hate to think that the times have turned a person of your stature to banditry. Why are you in my home?
Text: 세상이 이렇게 됐다고 너 같은 사람이 도둑질까지 하게 됐다고는 믿고 싶지 않아. 내 집에 왜 들어왔지?

TextEng: Who are you? Why are you in my home? I don't want to think my fellow Neverwintans would stoop to banditry.
Text: 넌 누구야? 왜 내 집에 들어왔지? 같은 네버윈터 사람들이 도둑질까지 한다고는 생각하고 싶지 않아.

TextEng: Must I worry about bandits as well as the plague? Give me a reason you are in my home or get out!
Text: 역병도 모자라 도둑까지 걱정해야 하나? 내 집에 들어온 이유를 대거나 당장 나가!

TextEng: Obviously they have lowered their expectations for new guards. If you can form questions, please ask them and leave.
Text: 새로 뽑는 경비대 수준을 확 낮췄나 보군. 물을 게 있으면 묻고 나가.

TextEng: I see. I had heard they were recruiting from outside the city. Very well, I will speak with you. I trust this will be brief?
Text: 그래. 도시 밖에서까지 사람을 끌어온다더니. 좋아, 얘기해 주지. 오래 걸리진 않겠지?

TextEng: Not much. There's very little that I need to know except that it kills my friends and family.
Text: 별로. 내 친구랑 가족을 죽인다는 것 말고 알아야 할 게 뭐가 있겠어.

TextEng: Lord Nasher assures us that all efforts are being made to find a cure. Beyond that... I haven't heard anything.
Text: 나셰르 영주님이 치료법을 찾기 위해 모든 노력을 다하고 있다고는 하더군. 그 말고는... 들은 게 없어.

TextEng: Farewell. Please leave my home as you found it.
Text: 그럼 잘 가. 들어왔을 때 그대로 두고 나가.

TextEng: What is it you want to know? I am sure you would get better answers from your fellow guards. I am a simple citizen.
Text: 뭘 알고 싶은데? 같은 경비들에게 묻는 게 더 낫겠지. 난 그냥 평범한 시민이야.

TextEng: I can't say much. I live and work in the City Core. The Blacklake district is beyond my means, and I certainly have no business in the others.
Text: 아는 게 많지 않아. 난 도시 중심부에서 살며 일하거든. 검은호수 지구는 감히 넘볼 형편이 아니고, 다른 지구엔 볼일도 없지.

TextEng: I don't bother with the Beggar's Nest, the Docks, or the Peninsula. They were rough enough before the Wailing took hold.
Text: 거지 소굴이니 항만이니 반도 지구니... 거긴 관심도 없어. '울부짖는 죽음 역병'이 퍼지기 전부터 험악했거든.

TextEng: Sorry, I really don't get out of the City Core much. Especially now with the plague everywhere. It's just not safe.
Text: 미안하지만 난 도시 중심부 밖으로 잘 안 나가. 특히 지금처럼 역병이 창궐할 땐 더더욱. 안전하지가 않아.

TextEng: That is where you are now. It is the business center of the city. Really, this should all be evident to you after just walking around.
Text: 지금 네가 있는 곳이 거기야. 도시의 상업 중심이지. 솔직히 좀만 돌아다녀도 알 만한 거잖아.

TextEng: Home to the slums. The Beggar's Nest was poor enough before the Wailing. I don't want to think about what it would be like now.
Text: 빈민가가 모여 있는 곳. 거지 소굴은 '울부짖는 죽음 역병' 전에도 충분히 비참했어. 지금은 상상도 하기 싫다.

TextEng: Good. I don't need strange people invading my home.
Text: 좋지. 낯선 사람들이 내 집을 침범하는 꼴은 더 보고 싶지 않거든.

TextEng: I see no reason to answer. You invaded my home and haven't offered any explanation why. Just get out.
Text: 대답할 이유가 없네. 내 집에 들어와 놓고 이유도 못 대잖아. 그냥 나가.

TextEng: Well, it appears there is very little I can do to prevent you doing what you wish. Does this mean you intend to rob my home?
Text: 보아하니 네가 하겠단 걸 막을 방법은 없나 보군. 그러니까 내 집을 털겠다는 건가?

TextEng: You again? I'm sorry, but is there really a reason for you to remain in my home?
Text: 또 너야? 미안한데, 정말 내 집에 더 있을 이유가 있나?

TextEng: Hmph. Outsiders hired to replace our dead. I suppose they expect me to trust you? I'll answer a few questions, but then you should leave.
Text: 흥. 죽은 사람들 대신 외부인을 끌어오는군. 우리가 그런 너희를 믿길 바라는 건가? 몇 가지만 답하겠다. 그다음엔 나가.

TextEng: I can't tell you anything about the place. I've been lucky enough to save a few coins here and there.
Text: 그쪽 사정은 몰라. 난 여기저기서 겨우 푼돈이나 모으는 처지야.

TextEng: I don't know much about it. I try to stay away from the rougher areas of the city. I hear talk about pirates, but I wouldn't know.
Text: 잘 몰라. 난 도시에서 험한 동네는 피하는 편이거든. 해적 얘기는 들었지만, 자세한 건 몰라.

TextEng: The Blacklake district is the wealthiest part of the city. I don't have much cause to go there. I can't afford to look like I belong there.
Text: 검은호수 지구는 이 도시에서 제일 부유한 동네야. 갈 일도 없고, 거기에 어울릴 차림을 할 돈도 없어.

TextEng: I've got no reason to know anything about the Peninsula district. Only the roughest of our criminal element end up there.
Text: 반도 지구에 대해 알 이유가 없지. 가장 악질 범죄자들이나 끌려가는 곳이니까.

TextEng: It's worse than the Docks, I hear. I've never been there, though.
Text: 항만보다도 더 험하단 얘기는 들었어. 난 가 본 적 없지만.

TextEng: Which district did you want to ask about? I don't know much.
Text: 어느 지구를 묻는 거지? 많이 알진 못해.

TextEng: I don't pay much attention to politics. I follow Lord Nasher as our leader, and Lady Aribeth of the Neverwinter Nine.
Text: 정치엔 별 관심 없어. 우린 지도자로 나셰르 영주님을 따르고, 네버윈터 9인회의 아리베스 경을 믿지.

TextEng: Lord Nasher has pledged any needed resources to curing the plague. He has been quite supportive, as any leader would when tragedy strikes.
Text: 나셰르 영주님은 역병 치료에 필요한 자원을 전부 투입하겠다고 약속했어. 비극이 닥치면 당연히 그래야지.

TextEng: Actually, I should say that it was his advisors that made his intentions known. Lord Nasher himself has wisely been locked away to protect against the plague.
Text: 정확히는 참모들이 대신 뜻을 밝힌 거지만. 나셰르 영주님 본인은 역병을 피하려고 성에 머무는 게 현명하니까.

TextEng: Now, are we just about done? You are still in my home uninvited.
Text: 이제 다 됐나? 넌 아직도 초대받지 않고 내 집에 있거든.

TextEng: I don't know any specifics, but she has been on the front lines of everything, working with people, trying to organize.
Text: 자세한 건 몰라도, 아리베스 경은 최전선에서 사람들과 함께 일하고, 조직을 정비하고 있지.

TextEng: The only people we see more are the Helmites, dispensing their blessings. I'm not sure who they report to. Someone under Aribeth?
Text: 그보다 자주 보이는 건 헬름의 사제들이야. 축복을 베푼다나. 누구 지휘를 받는진 모르겠는데, 아리베스 경 쪽이겠지?

TextEng: Does that suffice? Do you have more questions or will you leave my home now?
Text: 이 정도면 됐지? 더 묻겠다면 몰라도, 이제 내 집에서 나가 줄래?

TextEng: I've heard of an increase in banditry, which is why I'd like you to leave my home.
Text: 도둑질이 늘었다더군. 그러니 제발 내 집에서 나가 줘.

TextEng: May I assist you? I don't want to be rude, but you *are* in my home uninvited.
Text: 무슨 일로 왔지? 무례하게 굴긴 싫지만, 넌 초대 없이 내 집에 들어왔어.

TextEng: Why are you here in my home? Please leave.
Text: 왜 내 집에 와 있지? 제발 나가.

TextEng: Why are you here? Are you a bandit? I have nothing worth your time. Please, just leave.
Text: 왜 왔어? 도둑이야? 네가 탐낼 만한 건 없어. 제발 그냥 나가.

TextEng: That doesn't mean you can invade my home... does it? I'll answer your questions, but I would like you to leave afterward.
Text: 그렇다고 내 집을 막 들이닥쳐도 된다는 뜻은... 아니겠지? 물을 거 묻고, 그다음엔 나가 줬으면 해.

TextEng: Please, don't speak of it in my home. I've been lucky enough to avoid it and I don't wish to tempt the fates.
Text: 제발, 내 집에서 역병 얘기는 하지 마. 우린 아직 운 좋게 비켜 갔어. 재수 더럽히고 싶지 않거든.

TextEng: The Helmites claim their blessings are a cure. I don't know. Everyday I see a few less of my neighbors around.
Text: 헬름의 사제들은 자기 축복이 치료라는데, 난 모르겠어. 날이 갈수록 이웃이 하나둘씩 사라지기만 하니까.

TextEng: Farewell. Please leave my home as you found it.
Text: 그럼 잘 가. 들어왔을 때 그대로 두고 나가.

TextEng: I'm not sure what you are asking about. It's a big city.
Text: 무슨 걸 묻는 건지 잘 모르겠네. 여긴 큰 도시야.

TextEng: Well, I live in the City Core, so I don't get around much. There's four other districts, but I don't have much cause to visit them.
Text: 난 도시 중심부에 살아서 잘 돌아다니지도 않아. 다른 지구가 넷이나 있지만, 갈 일은 거의 없지.

TextEng: There's the Beggar's Nest, the Docks, the Peninsula, and Blacklake. I guess I could say something about them.
Text: 거지 소굴, 항만, 반도 지구, 검은호수. 그 정도 얘긴 해 줄 수 있겠네.

TextEng: Not really. All I hear of is the plague and the death. It's almost too much. I don't want to know if there's anything else going on.
Text: 아니. 들리는 건 역병이랑 죽음뿐이야. 너무 버겁다 보니, 다른 일은 알기도 싫어.

TextEng: Why? That's where you are now. Couldn't you just walk around? Did you have to break into my home to learn that?
Text: 왜? 지금 네가 있는 데가 거기야. 조금만 돌아다녀도 알 텐데, 굳이 내 집을 털어가며 물어야 했니?

TextEng: It's the poorest district. I don't give it much thought, really. Makes me feel bad, especially with it hit so hard by the Wailing.
Text: 제일 가난한 지구지. 생각하려고도 안 해. 특히 '울부짖는 죽음 역병'으로 제일 크게 맞았으니까.

TextEng: Thank you. If times were better I might welcome... visitors, but not now.
Text: 고마워. 때가 좋았으면 손님을 반겼겠지만, 지금은 아니야.

TextEng: You can't just barge into peoples' homes and question them! What right do you have to do that?
Text: 남의 집에 막 들이닥쳐서 캐묻는 게 어디 법이냐고! 무슨 권리로 그래?

TextEng: And I am supposed to accept this? What do you want from me? Why bother with my little home?
Text: 그래서 그걸 내가 받아들이라고? 대체 뭐가 필요해서 내 초라한 집에까지 온 건데?

TextEng: What are we coming to? Threatened in my own home! Thief! Bandit! Get out of here!
Text: 세상이 어찌 되려는 거야? 내 집에서 협박까지 당하다니! 도둑놈! 강도! 썩 꺼져!

TextEng: Yes? Is there something else you need? I had hoped my previous answers were enough and you'd leave.
Text: 왜? 또 필요해? 아까 대답이면 충분해서 나갈 줄 알았는데.

TextEng: I still don't know you. I never invited you into my home. Ask your questions if you want, but get out after.
Text: 난 아직도 네가 누군지 모른다. 초대한 적도 없고. 물을 게 있으면 물어. 그다음엔 나가.

TextEng: I hear it's a busy place, but I guess it's pretty rough. Lots of transients come in on the ships. Pirates too.
Text: 항만은 사람 드나듦이 많고 꽤 험하대. 배 따라 떠돌이도 많고, 해적도.

TextEng: I wish I could tell you about the Blacklake. I wouldn't be able to get the time of day from the people that live there. Stuffy nobles.
Text: 검은호수 얘길 해 주면 좋겠지만, 거긴 콧대 높은 귀족들 천지라서 인사도 못 받아. 나와는 상관없는 동네지.

TextEng: I wouldn't know anything about the Peninsula district. Good people stay away from it. That's where the prison is.
Text: 반도 지구는 아예 몰라. 착한 사람은 멀리하는 곳이야. 감옥이 있거든.

TextEng: Which district did you want to ask about? I don't know much.
Text: 어느 지구 얘길 듣고 싶은데? 많이 알진 못해.

TextEng: Oh, I don't know much about that sort of thing. Lord Nasher keeps the city peaceful and that's good enough for me. He's a good man.
Text: 정치는 잘 몰라. 나셰르 영주님이 도시 질서를 지킨다니 그걸로 됐지. 좋은 분이야.

TextEng: Well, we don't see much of him now. Castle Never is locked up so he doesn't get the plague. I'm sure he's doing all he can.
Text: 요즘은 얼굴 볼 일도 없지. 네버 성에 틀어박혀 역병을 피하는 게 당연하니까. 그래도 할 건 다 하고 있을 거야.

TextEng: Lady Aribeth has been acting in his stead, I believe. She's a good woman. Keeps the rabble in line.
Text: 아리베스 경이 그 대신 앞장서고 있어. 좋은 분이지. 어수선한 민심도 다독이고.

TextEng: Does that suffice? I would like you out of here as soon as possible, please.
Text: 이 정도면 됐지? 제발 가능한 한 빨리 나가 줘.

TextEng: Oh, she is tireless. She's been organizing and... taking care of the dead. It must be a terribly straining job for her.
Text: 그분은 정말 쉴 틈도 없이 뛰어. 조직을 꾸리고... 죽은 이들을 수습하고. 얼마나 고될지 짐작도 안 가.

TextEng: The guards are a bit shortstaffed, as you know. The Helmites are backing them up, I guess, but I don't know what they are specifically doing.
Text: 경비대는 사람이 모자라잖아. 헬름의 사제들이 거들어 주는 것 같긴 한데, 정확히 뭘 하는진 몰라.

TextEng: You are just fishing for questions now. Please, I told you I don't know much. Could you just leave?
Text: 그만 좀 캐묻지 그래? 진짜 아는 게 별로 없다니까. 이쯤에서 나가 줄래?

TextEng: You look nice, but why are you in our home? Does Mommy know you?
Text: 멋져 보이는데, 왜 우리 집에 와 있어요? 엄마가 아세요?

TextEng: Hello. Why are you here? Not many people come around now. Mommy says some people are sick.
Text: 안녕하세요. 왜 여기 오셨어요? 요즘엔 아무도 잘 안 와요. 엄마가 어떤 사람들은 아프대요.

TextEng: I don't want to talk to you. You look scary, and Mommy said I shouldn't talk to scary people.
Text: 말하기 싫어요. 무서워 보여요. 엄마가 무서운 사람이랑 말하지 말라 했어요.

TextEng: Hehe... you sound funny.
Text: 히히... 말하는 게 웃겨요.

TextEng: Mommy says guards are good, and I should do like they say.
Text: 엄마가 경비 아저씨들은 착하대요. 시키는 대로 해야 한대요.

TextEng: That's what makes people sick, right? Some of my friends got that, and they don't come around any more. I miss them.
Text: 그게 사람을 아프게 만드는 거죠? 제 친구들도 몇 명 걸렸어요. 그래서 이제 같이 못 놀아요. 보고 싶어요.

TextEng: Bye. Don't get sick, okay?
Text: 안녕히 가세요. 아프지 마요!

TextEng: It's big. I have to stay close to Mommy lots or I get lost.
Text: 도시는 커요. 엄마한테 꼭 붙어 있어야 길을 안 잃어요.

TextEng: There's my house... and school sometimes, but not for a while now. And the castle! It's big! I can't go by myself. That's all, I think.
Text: 우리 집이 있고... 가끔 학교도 갔는데, 요즘엔 못 가요. 그리고 성! 엄청 커요! 혼자는 못 가요. 음... 그게 다예요.

TextEng: You get spanked if you make someone eat a bug. And beans will grow if you put them in your nose.
Text: 벌레 먹이게 하면 혼나요. 그리고 콩을 코에 넣으면 진짜 자란대요.

TextEng: Byebye. You go now.
Text: 안녕. 이제 가세요.

TextEng: Hmm... I don't think I can talk to you. Mommy says strangers might be bad.
Text: 으음... 말하면 안 될 것 같아요. 엄마가 모르는 사람은 나쁠 수 있대요.

TextEng: You're mean! Why are you mean? Oh! I bet you're not supposed to be here! I bet Mommy didn't let you in!
Text: 나빠요! 왜 그렇게 나빠요? 아! 여기 오면 안 되는 거죠? 엄마가 들여보내 준 적 없어요!

TextEng: Go away! I want all scary people to go away!
Text: 가세요! 무서운 사람은 다 가 버렸으면 좋겠어요!

TextEng: Hi again, <Mister/Missus> Guard. Why are you still here?
Text: 또 안녕하세요, 경비님. 왜 아직 여기 있어요?

TextEng: That's Mommy and Daddy, silly. Sometimes they listen to Mister Nasher, but he lives in the castle. Maybe he's nice, but I don't know.
Text: 그건 엄마랑 아빠요. 가끔 나셰르 영주님 말을 듣는데, 그분은 성에 살아요. 착할지도 모르지만, 저는 잘 몰라요.

TextEng: You must be one of the new city guard. Hopefully you can do something about those zombies in the Beggar's Nest.
Text: 너 새로 뽑힌 도시 경비대지? 거지 소굴에 들끓는 좀비들 좀 어떻게 해 줘.

TextEng: You must be one of the new city guard. Hopefully you can do something about those zombies in the Beggar's Nest.
Text: 너 새로 뽑힌 도시 경비대지? 거지 소굴에 들끓는 좀비들 좀 어떻게 해 줘.

TextEng: Hmph! You look like you must be one of them escaped convicts from the prison break in the Peninsula district!
Text: 흥! 꼴을 보아하니 반도 지구의 감옥 탈옥 때 달아난 죄수 같구만!

TextEng: What are you doing with no clothes! You want to get sick and catch the plague?
Text: 옷도 안 걸치고 뭐 하는 거야! 그러다 병 걸려 울부짖는 죽음 역병까지 옮는다!

TextEng: Why are you naked? You must be plague stricken! Get away from me!
Text: 왜 알몸이야? 역병에 걸린 게 틀림없네! 저리 가!

TextEng: A naked plague victim! Don't touch me!
Text: 알몸의 역병 환자잖아! 손대지 마!

TextEng: Those wounds look terrible! You better get looked after before you come down with the Wailing Death.
Text: 상처가 엄청나잖아! 울부짖는 죽음 역병에 걸리기 전에 치료부터 받아!

TextEng: You're bleeding all over the place! Get some healing before your wounds get infected with plague!
Text: 피를 철철 흘리고 있잖아! 상처에 역병 옮기기 전에 치료받아!

TextEng: That must have been some fight you were in. Don't those wounds hurt?
Text: 상당한 싸움을 했나 보네. 그 상처 안 아프냐?

TextEng: You aren't quite right in the head, are you? Maybe you escaped during the prison break in the Penisula district.
Text: 머리가 좀 이상한 거 아냐? 반도 지구의 감옥 탈옥 때 빠져나왔나 보지?

TextEng: I heard the Beggar's Nest was crawling with zombies infected by the plague!
Text: 거지 소굴에 역병 걸린 좀비가 들끓는대!

TextEng: Not too bright, are you? Maybe your mind was destroyed by the plague! Get away from me!
Text: 머리가 썩 밝진 않지? 역병이 정신까지 갉아먹은 거냐! 저리 가!

TextEng: Quit waving your weapon around like a thug! Criminals aren't running things around here; this isn't the Docks district!
Text: 무기를 깡패처럼 함부로 휘두르지 마! 여긴 범죄자들이 판치는 항만 지구가 아니야!

TextEng: I heard the Blacklake nobles have a cure for the plague, but they won't share it with us common folk! I hear a lot of things, though.
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들이 역병 치료법을 갖고 있다더라. 우리 같은 서민한테는 안 나눈다지만! 뜬소문이야, 뭐.

TextEng: Think carrying that weapon will keep the Wailing Death at bay? May as well spit in the Anauroch!
Text: 그 무기 들고 다닌다고 울부짖는 죽음 역병을 막을 수 있을 것 같아? 아나우록 사막에 침 뱉는 격이지!

TextEng: Sorry cleric, but I can't even begin to think the gods are good while the stink of burning corpses covers everything.
Text: 미안한데, 성직자. 타는 시체 냄새가 진동하는데도 신들이 선하다고 믿긴 힘들어.

TextEng: You're a cleric; why don't you do something about the zombies terrorizing the Beggar's Nest! This would never happen in Tethyr!
Text: 성직자라면서 왜 거지 소굴을 괴롭히는 좀비들부터 어떻게 하지 않아! 테티르였으면 이런 꼴 안 났을 거야!

TextEng: You're a holy <man/woman>; can't you make the nobles in the Blacklake district share their cure?
Text: 거룩한 분이라면서? 검은호수 지구의 귀족들이 치료법을 나누게 만들 순 없나?

TextEng: Hmph. Keep your magic to yourself around here, <sir/madam>. Some blame sorcery for the plague! They might banish mages to the Mere of Dead Men. Maybe.
Text: 여기선 마법은 집어넣어, 모험가 양반. 어떤 사람들은 역병을 주술 탓으로 돌려! 마법사들을 죽은 자들의 늪지대로 추방할지도 몰라. 아마도.

TextEng: There's anarchy in the Docks district! I heard criminals have taken over and the city guard are afraid to go in there now.
Text: 항만 지구는 아수라장이래! 범죄자들이 장악해서 경비대도 들어가길 무서워한다더군.

TextEng: Heard about the prison break in the Peninsula district? As if the plague wasn't bad enough!
Text: 반도 지구에서 탈옥 소동 났다며? 역병도 모자라 일이나 터지고!

TextEng: They say plague-corpses walk the streets in the Beggar's Nest, feasting on the living!
Text: 거지 소굴 거리에 역병 시체들이 돌아다니며 산 사람을 뜯어 먹는다잖아!

TextEng: The nobles in the Blacklake district have sealed themselves away from everyone. There's something strange there, mark my words!
Text: 검은호수 지구 귀족들이 스스로만 살겠다고 문을 걸어 잠갔대. 분명 수상한 냄새가 나, 내 말 명심해!

TextEng: Be wary of the humans in this town. They'll tax you extra for your <race> blood, I'm not joking. Almost as bad as Calimport.
Text: 이 동네 인간들 조심해. 네 <race> 혈통을 탓 한다고 세금을 더 물릴 거야, 농담 아니야. 칼림포트만큼이나 고약하지.

TextEng: I heard pirates have taken over the Docks district. A pretty girl like you would be best to stay away from there.
Text: 항만은 해적들이 장악했다더라. 너같이 예쁜 아가씨는 근처에도 가지 마.

TextEng: Them nobles are up to something in the Blacklake district. I hear they got themselves a secret cure for the plague!
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들이 뭔가 꾸미는 중이래. 자기들만 쓰는 비밀 치료법이 있다더군!

TextEng: We sure don't have many local girls who look like you - not since the plague killed 'em all off.
Text: 네버윈터에 너처럼 생긴 아가씨가 많지 않았지... 역병이 다 데려갔거든.

TextEng: Ain't you handsome! Better stay away from the Docks - the thugs there will mess up that pretty face something awful.
Text: 잘생겼구만! 항만은 가지 마라-거기 깡패들이 그 얼굴을 망가뜨릴 거다.

TextEng: Them nobles are up to something in the Blacklake district. I hear they got themselves a secret cure for the plague!
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들이 뭔가 꾸미는 중이래. 자기들만 쓰는 비밀 치료법이 있다더군!

TextEng: You're a handsome one. Just don't catch the plague, or your looks won't last long.
Text: 잘생긴 양반이네. 역병만 걸리지 마라, 그 얼굴도 오래 못 간다.

TextEng: A word of advice: be careful. If you catch the Wailing Death, it'll be *your* corpse we smell burning.
Text: 충고 하나: 조심해. 울부짖는 죽음 역병에 걸리면 다음에 우리가 맡을 타는 시체 냄새는 네 것이 될 거야.

TextEng: I heard there was a prison break in the Peninsula district. I wonder if the rumors are true.
Text: 반도 지구에서 탈옥이 있었다던데. 소문이 진짠가 모르겠군.

TextEng: I heard there was a prison break in the Peninsula district. I suppose we'll be burning more corpses if it's true.
Text: 반도 지구에서 탈옥이 있었다던데. 사실이면 더 많은 시체를 태워야겠지.

TextEng: Them nobles are up to something in the Blacklake district. I hear they got themselves a secret cure for the plague!
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들이 뭔가 꾸미는 중이래. 자기들만 쓰는 비밀 치료법이 있다더군!

TextEng: Them nobles are up to something in the Blacklake district. I hear they got themselves a secret cure for the plague!
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들이 뭔가 꾸미는 중이래. 자기들만 쓰는 비밀 치료법이 있다더군!

TextEng: People like you belong in the Docks district - along with the rest of the thugs and ruffians!
Text: 너 같은 부류는 항만 지구가 어울려-다른 건달들하고 같이 말이야!

TextEng: You must be from up in the mountains... maybe even the Spine of the World? The plague spread up there yet?
Text: 산에서 왔지? 어쩌면 세상의 등뼈 산맥 쪽? 거기까지 역병 퍼졌냐?

TextEng: What a brute you are! You must have escaped during the prison break in the Peninsula district.
Text: 건장하군! 반도 지구 감옥 탈옥 때 도망친 모양이지?

TextEng: You aren't with those pirates in the Docks, are you? I thought they were only around the Nelanther Isles. Guess I don't know much.
Text: 항만 해적들하고 한패는 아니지? 그 자들은 넬란서 제도 근처에만 있는 줄 알았는데. 내가 아는 게 없나 보네.

TextEng: Well, wonderful. Another <race> lout wandering about. Plague carriers are what your kind are!
Text: 그래, 또 <race> 촌놈 하나 돌아다니는구만. 너희 종족은 역병 퍼뜨리는 운반책이지!

TextEng: The militia can't keep order anymore! The guards in the Core don't even care that there was a prison break in the Penisula district.
Text: 민병대가 더는 질서를 못 지켜! 도시 중심부 경비대는 반도 지구에서 탈옥이 났는데도 신경도 안 쓴다니까!

TextEng: Oh, hello. You're <race>, right? Plague take all the <race> race, I say!
Text: 오, 안녕. 너 <race> 맞지? <race> 족 전부를 역병이 쓸어가 버렸으면 좋겠네!

TextEng: Commoner
Text: 평민

TextEng: Commoner
Text: 평민

TextEng: Commoner
Text: 평민

TextEng: Commoner
Text: 평민

TextEng: Commoner
Text: 평민

TextEng: You <sir/madam>, are an absolute disgrace to this fine city. Get out of my sight.
Text: 당신, 이 훌륭한 도시의 수치야. 내 눈앞에서 꺼져.

TextEng: Oh, I did hear about some sort of trouble. Something about the Head Gaoler being taken over by something. It all sounded rather unpleasant to me.
Text: 아, 무슨 소란이 있었다고 들었지. 간수장이 무언가에 씌였다는 얘기였나. 듣기만 해도 영 불쾌하더군.

TextEng: But, it's not my affair. Your kind probably keep a closer eye on that sort of thing. In fact, you look similar to the one I heard fixed the problem. Probably unrelated.
Text: 하지만 내 일이 아니지. 그런 건 너희 같은 부류가 더 잘 지켜보겠지. 사실 그 일을 해결했다는 사람과 너 닮았더라. 아마 상관없겠지만.

TextEng: I... I see. And how does this apply to me?
Text: 그, 그래. 그런데 그게 나랑 무슨 상관이야?

TextEng: A district of selfish, hoarding nobles! I heard that one had even secreted away a huge reserve of food! Imagine, keeping that from the people who need it!
Text: 이기적인 귀족들이 쌓아두고 사는 동네지! 어떤 놈은 식량을 산더미처럼 숨겨놨다더라! 필요한 사람들한테서 그걸 감춘다고 생각해 봐!

TextEng: I think someone took care of him, but I haven't heard any details. Hmm... I think maybe they mentioned something about someone like you being in the area. I don't know, though.
Text: 누가 처리했다던데, 자세한 건 몰라. 흠... 그 근처에 너 같은 사람이 있었다고도 하던데. 글쎄.

TextEng: I don't go near there, especially not after I heard about all the thieves that were all over the district just recently. I mean, I just wouldn't feel safe.
Text: 그쪽엔 안 가. 특히 최근에 그 지구에 도둑이 들끓었다는 소문 듣고 나선 더더욱. 가면 목숨이 위태로울 것 같거든.

TextEng: I even heard that they were overrun with zombies, but I guess that has calmed down. Hey, I think I even heard it was someone like you in there helping. Ah, I doubt it.
Text: 좀비까지 들끓었다더라, 지금은 잠잠해졌다지만. 그러고 보니 너 같은 사람이 가서 도왔다고도 들은 듯한데... 에이, 설마.

TextEng: I guess the guards have been saying it's settled down now... you didn't have anything to do with that, hmm? No, I doubt a guard like that would have entered my home like this.
Text: 경비대 말로는 이제 잠잠해졌다더군... 네가 한몫한 건 아니지? 아니지, 그런 경비대라면 내 집을 이렇게 침범하진 않았겠지.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Well, I can't afford much, but if I give something, maybe someone else will too. Who knows, I might end up with the plague and get it back.
Text: 좋아, 많진 않지만 조금은 내지. 내가 내면 다른 사람도 낼지 모르지. 어쩌면 나도 역병에 걸려 돌려받을지도 모르고.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> With the plague going the way it is, everyone will need that gold eventually, so I might as well keep it. I could get it like everyone else.
Text: 역병이 이 지경인데, 결국 모두 금이 필요해질 거야. 그러니 난 내 거 챙기겠다. 다른 사람들처럼.

TextEng: Now, don't you have a charity seal for me? I can't get a break from the taxman without... wait... you aren't wearing the sash... the sash of approved charity solicitors...
Text: 그래, 자선 인가 도장은 있지? 그거 없으면 세금 감면도 못 받... 잠깐, 어깨띠가 없네... 공인 자선 모금원 어깨띠 말이야...

TextEng: Well, make up your mind. YOU are the one imposing on ME
Text: 그래, 결정을 해. 날 들이받고 있는 건 바로 너라고.

TextEng: Oh, no, I've already contributed all I'm going to. I've about had enough of this. If you've got questions, you had better ask them quick and get out.
Text: 아니, 낼 건 이미 다 냈어. 이쯤에서 지겹다. 질문 있으면 빨리 하고 꺼져.

TextEng: W-what? You... you don't mean that, do you? I don't have anything here worth my life! I'm... I'm nobody!
Text: 뭐, 뭐라고? 너... 진심은 아니지? 여긴 내 목숨 값어치 나는 게 없어! 난... 난 그냥 아무도 아니라고!

TextEng: Don't hurt me! Isn't the plague bad enough without you stealing what little I have? Just take it and go... it's all the gold I have... Get out...
Text: 해치지 마! 역병도 모자라 가진 거까지 훔칠 거야? 가져가고 꺼져... 가진 금은 이게 전부야... 나가...

TextEng: I... I don't know what you are trying to pull, but I don't like it. Ask your questions and get out.
Text: 네가 뭘 꾸미는지 모르겠지만 마음에 안 들어. 질문만 하고 꺼져.

TextEng: You filthy... I've been had, haven't I... Get out... get out of my home! Get out!!
Text: 더러운 자식... 속았네, 그치... 나가... 내 집에서 나가! 당장 나가!!

TextEng: Oh, the poorest of the districts. They got the worst of the plague, and I even heard there were undead rising up all over. Can you imagine?
Text: 아, 가장 가난한 지구지. 역병 피해도 제일 컸어. 사방에서 언데드가 일어났다는 말까지 들었다니까. 상상이 가?

TextEng: I guess one of the new militia recruits got rid of them all, but still... zombies! I can't imagine...
Text: 새로 뽑힌 민병대가 다 쓸어냈다던데, 그래도... 좀비라니! 상상도 안 돼...

TextEng: Normally I wouldn't know anything about the Docks, but everyone is talking about how one of the new militia recruits went toe to toe with old Vengaul Bloodsail!
Text: 보통은 항만 일엔 관심도 없는데, 새로 뽑힌 민병대가 늙은 벵골 블러드세일이랑 맞붙었다고들 떠들더라!

TextEng: I guess thieves were everywhere in there, and there was some sort of rebellion in the Bloodsailors. All over now, though. Of course, I only hear this through rumor and such.
Text: 거기 도둑이 들끓었고 핏빛 항해자들 내부에서 반란도 있었다더라. 지금은 다 끝났대. 물론 다 소문으로만 들었지.

TextEng: I'm not even looking in the direction of the Blacklake anymore. I heard one of them stuffy nobles was hoarding food away from us that need it!
Text: 이젠 검은호수 쪽은 쳐다보지도 않아. 거들먹거리는 귀족 하나가 우리 같은 사람들 몰래 식량을 쌓아뒀다더군!

TextEng: I guess someone put a stop to it, but that don't change what they did. I hate them nobles.
Text: 누가 막았다지만, 그들이 한 짓이 사라지는 건 아니지. 저 귀족들이라면 치가 떨려.

TextEng: I heard some strange things about the Peninsula district and the prison there. I heard it had to be cleaned out by the militia because the Head Gaoler went insane!
Text: 반도 지구의 감옥 얘기도 이상하더라. 간수장이 미쳐서 민병대가 들어가 통째로 쓸어냈다잖아!

TextEng: I guess it's safer in there now, but I don't even want to know what could cause all the trouble they had. I got enough to worry about.
Text: 지금은 좀 안전해졌다지만, 대체 무슨 일이었는지 알고 싶지도 않아. 내 걱정만으로도 벅차.

TextEng: This is about gold? The air is thick with plague, people are dying in the streets, and you want gold? Tell me you are not so repugnant as this!
Text: 금 때문이라고? 공기엔 역병 냄새가 진동하고 사람들이 길에서 죽어가는데, 입에서 금 소리가 나와? 설마 그렇게 역겨운 건 아니라고 말해줘!

TextEng: Don't! Please! I just want to live through the plague... I just want to live... take my gold... take whatever... just get out.
Text: 안 돼! 제발! 난 그저 이 역병을 살아넘기고 싶어... 그냥 살고 싶어... 금 가져가... 뭐든 가져가... 제발 나가.

TextEng: Not me. I've already been threatened and stolen from. I've nothing left to give, so say what you've come to say and get out!
Text: 난 안 돼. 이미 협박도 당하고 털릴 대로 털렸어. 줄 게 없어! 할 말 있으면 하고 꺼져!

TextEng: What? Tell me... tell me this is just some sick joke... or something... right? I'm... I'm not anyone important... why do this to me?
Text: 뭐? 이게 그저 더러운 농담이라든가... 그런 거라고 해줘... 응? 난... 난 별 볼일 없는 사람이야... 왜 나한테 이래?

TextEng: I don't understand what just happened. Please leave my home. I have enough to worry about without your strange threats.
Text: 방금 무슨 일이 벌어진 건지 모르겠다. 제발 내 집에서 나가. 네 기묘한 협박 없이도 걱정할 게 충분해.

TextEng: I don't understand what you want. I'll answer your questions, but you have to get out of my home afterward.
Text: 네가 뭘 원하는지 모르겠어. 질문엔 답하겠지만, 끝나면 당장 나가.

TextEng: B-but... please, no! Isn't the plague enough to suffer through? You rotten... here, take what I have. Take it all.
Text: 그, 그런데... 제발, 안 돼! 역병 겪는 것만으로도 충분하지 않아? 못된 것... 여기, 가진 거 가져가. 전부 가져가.

TextEng: Plague everywhere and I have to worry about petty thieves! Get out!
Text: 사방이 역병인데 도둑까지 걱정해야 해? 나가!

TextEng: If you are threatening me to get gold, someone already beat you to it. I've nothing, no matter what you do. Just ask your questions and go.
Text: 금을 뜯으려 협박하는 거라면 벌써 누가 앞질렀어. 네가 뭘 해도 난 가진 게 없어. 질문만 하고 가.

TextEng: What? But I'm not supposed to let anyone in the house. I didn't let you in here at all. I'm gonna tell on you!
Text: 뭐라고? 하지만 난 아무도 집에 들이면 안 돼. 난 너 들여보낸 적 없어. 이르러 갈 거야!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> But... I didn't do anything this time. I lost our dog once but I didn't mean it. I didn't! Maybe... maybe I can give you my allowance?
Text: 하지만... 이번엔 아무것도 안 했어. 전에 우리 강아지 잃어버린 건 진짜 실수였단 말이야. 일부러 아니야! 아마... 아마 용돈을 줄 수는 있어?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> You can't tell on me. If you tell on me, Mommy will see that you are in the house and you aren't supposed to be here!
Text: 나 고자질 못 해. 고자질하면, 엄마가 네가 집 안에 있는 걸 보실 거고, 넌 여기 있으면 안 되잖아!

TextEng: Here, take it. I was saving up for stuff. Maybe candy, or maybe to pay the mages because Mommy doesn't feel well. Just take it and you not tell anyone.
Text: 여기, 가져. 뭐 사려고 모으던 거야. 사탕 사거나, 아니면 엄마가 아프셔서 마법사들한테 줄 돈이었어. 그냥 가져가고 아무한테도 말하지 마.

TextEng: Now you get out, too. I don't want to talk to you no more!
Text: 이제 너도 나가. 더는 너랑 말하기 싫어!

TextEng: Not again! I already gave away all my golds! I can't pay anybody not to tell that anymore! You just ask your stuff and go, or you gonna get yourself spanked but good!
Text: 또? 내 금화는 벌써 다 줬단 말야! 이제는 아무한테도 비밀값 못 줘! 질문만 하고 가, 안 그럼 혼날 줄 알아!

TextEng: Not anymore! I already gave some to somebody who was bad! I got no more to give, so if you are bad too, you can just go away!
Text: 이젠 안 줘! 나쁜 사람한테 이미 좀 줬어! 더 줄 게 없으니까, 너도 나쁘면 그냥 가버려!

TextEng: What? I gots what Mommy gives me for if she doesn't come home sometime. She said I should keep it safe just in case she gets sick. I hope she doesn't get sick.
Text: 뭐? 이건 엄마가 가끔 집에 못 오실 때 쓰라고 주신 돈이야. 아프실지도 모르니까 잘 챙기라고 하셨어. 엄마가 안 아프셨으면 좋겠어.

TextEng: What? But you look likes a guard... I thought (sniff) Mommy said... guards were good. You're not good... You're not good at all!
Text: 뭐라고? 근데 너 경비대처럼 생겼잖아... 엄마가 그랬는데... 경비대는 착하다고... 넌 착하지 않아... 전혀 아니야!

TextEng: Here! Take my golds! Mommy gave them, and she'll be mad when she hears this! You better go, or she'll spank you good!
Text: 여기! 내 금화 가져가! 엄마가 주신 건데, 이 얘기 들으면 화내실 거야! 빨리 가, 안 그럼 엄마가 널 혼내실 거야!

TextEng: Those nobles were up to something in the Blacklake, but not any more. Rumors were they had a plague cure. I guess not...
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들이 뭔가 꾸미고 있었다지만 이제는 아니래. 울부짖는 죽음 역병 치료제가 있다던 소문도 있었지만... 아닌가 보지.

TextEng: I had heard the nobles in the Blacklake had a cure, but I guess it was all bluster and rumor. One of the new recruits put them in their place.
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들이 치료제를 갖고 있다 들었는데, 다 허풍과 소문이었나 보네. 새로 들어온 민병대 신입 하나가 혼쭐을 내줬다더군.

TextEng: I heard there were lots of people dead after the prison break in the Peninsula. Glad it's over. The plague kills enough of us.
Text: 반도 지구에서 탈옥 사태가 난 뒤에 죽은 사람이 많았다 들었어. 끝나서 다행이지. 울부짖는 죽음 역병만으로도 사람들이 충분히 죽고 있거든.

TextEng: I heard a new recruit took care of the zombies in the Beggar's Nest. I hope we don't burn the corpses in the Core, though. It smells bad enough now...
Text: 거지 소굴에선 새 민병대 신입이 좀비들을 처리했다더라. 그래도 도시 중심부에서까지 시신을 태우지는 말았으면 해. 지금도 냄새가 충분히 고약하거든...

TextEng: I heard there were lots of people dead after the prison break in the Peninsula. Glad it's over. The plague kills enough of us.
Text: 반도 지구에서 탈옥 사태가 난 뒤에 죽은 사람이 많았다 들었어. 끝나서 다행이지. 울부짖는 죽음 역병만으로도 사람들이 충분히 죽고 있거든.

TextEng: You one of the new city guard? I heard someone new took care of the zombies in the Beggar's Nest. Good job, whoever it was.
Text: 새 경비대원이야? 거지 소굴 좀비들을 새로 온 누가 처리했다던데. 누가 했든 잘했어.

TextEng: Those nobles were up to something in the Blacklake, but not any more. Rumors were they had a plague cure. I guess not... we're still burning our dead.
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들이 뭘 꾸미던 건 이제 끝났대. 치료제가 있다던 소문도 헛소문이었겠지... 우린 아직도 시신을 태우고 있으니까.

TextEng: Them nobles tried some fancy shenanigans in the Blacklake, but one of the militia put them in their place! Serves them right!
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들이 요란하게 뭐 좀 해보려다 민병대 신입한테 제대로 코가 납작해졌다더라! 쌤통이지!

TextEng: I heard pirates made a move on the Docks district, but they got put down by a new militia recruit. How humbling is that, huh?
Text: 항만 지구에 해적들이 덤볐다가 새로 들어온 민병대 신입한테 제압당했다더군. 참 창피하겠지, 안 그래?

TextEng: The nobles in the Blacklake have been put in their place, I hear. I hope, anyway. They're too full of themselves at the best of times.
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들이 떨거지들 취급을 좀 당했다더라. 그러길 바라지. 평소에도 잘난 체가 지나치거든.

TextEng: Corpses were walking the Beggar's Nest! They've been stopped, now, but who knows what's coming next!
Text: 거지 소굴에선 시체들이 걸어 다녔다니까! 지금은 막혔다지만, 다음엔 또 뭘로 덮칠지 누가 알아!

TextEng: You're obviously a thug of some sort. You missed your shot, though. I hear the criminals in the Docks are on the run now.
Text: 딱 보아하니 건달이구먼. 하지만 때를 놓쳤어. 항만 지구 범죄자들은 지금 도망치기 바쁘거든.

TextEng: I heard the prison break in the Peninsula district was put down violently. I hope the bodies don't get burned here. There's too many now.
Text: 반도 지구의 탈옥 사태가 강경 진압됐다더라. 제발 여기서까지 시신을 태우진 말았으면 좋겠어. 요즘은 너무 많아.

TextEng: I heard the Docks district is quieter now. Maybe I should go there. I really need to get away from the smell of burning flesh.
Text: 항만 지구가 요즘은 한결 조용하다더군. 거기로 가볼까. 시신 태우는 냄새에서 좀 벗어나고 싶어.

TextEng: Did you take your teachings to the Blacklake, holy <man/woman>? Is that why I hear their hoarding is over?
Text: 성직자, 검은호수에 가서 훈계를 좀 하고 온 건가? 그래서 걔네들이 사재기를 그만뒀다는 소문이 도는 거야?

TextEng: I suppose you and your god will be taking credit for the zombies in the Beggar's Nest being destroyed? Stop the plague, then I'll listen.
Text: 거지 소굴 좀비를 없앤 공도 너랑 네 신에게 돌리겠지? 울부짖는 죽음 역병부터 막아 봐. 그럼 들어줄게.

TextEng: I heard the Blacklake nobles were hoarding stuff, but someone went in there and did something about it. Mostly rumor, though.
Text: 검은호수의 귀족들이 물자를 끼고 산다던데, 누가 들어가서 손 좀 봤다더라. 뭐, 거의 소문이지만.

TextEng: At least the zombies in the Beggar's Nest have been dealt with. Of course, their corpses probably still carry plague...
Text: 그래도 거지 소굴 좀비는 처리됐지. 물론 시신엔 아직도 울부짖는 죽음 역병이 남아 있겠지만...

TextEng: Great - another gold grabbing mercenary here to bleed Gend's coffers dry.
Text: 좋군, 또 돈 밝히는 용병이네. 겐드의 금고나 말려 죽이러 왔지?

TextEng: Out of my way! I'm shipping to the Luskan front tomorrow, I don't have time for the likes of you.
Text: 비켜! 난 내일 러스칸 전선으로 출정이야. 네놈 따위랑 시간 낭비할 틈 없어.

TextEng: First Aribeth betrays us, then we have to ally ourselves with the likes of you. Grim times.
Text: 먼저 아리베스 경이 우릴 배신하더니, 이제는 너 같은 것들과 손을 잡아야 한다니. 참 험한 시절이야.

TextEng: I know we need all the help we can get, but I don't trust them Uthgardt up on the plateau.
Text: 어떤 도움이든 필요하다는 건 알지만, 저 고원의 우스가르트 놈들은 못 믿겠어.

TextEng: I can't believe Aribeth betrayed us!
Text: 아리베스 경이 우릴 배신했다는 걸 아직도 믿을 수가 없어!

TextEng: I can't talk right now. I've got to get my stuff ready - I'm shipping out to the front tomorrow.
Text: 지금 말 못 해. 짐 챙겨야 해-내일 전선으로 나가거든.

TextEng: I'm sorry, I can't talk right now. I've got to get my stuff ready - I'm shipping out to the front tomorrow.
Text: 미안하지만 지금은 얘기 못 해. 짐을 챙겨야 해-내일 전선으로 나가거든.

TextEng: You look like you're a cut above the usual rabble serving the Lords' Alliance. Good to have someone competent on board!
Text: 군주 연합에 붙은 얼치기들보단 한 수 위처럼 보이네. 쓸 만한 전력이 늘어서 다행이야!

TextEng: You must be one of those mercenaries Gend has hired to search for the Words of Power. I wish you luck.
Text: 겐드가 권능의 언령을 찾으려고 고용한 용병 중 하나구만. 행운을 빌지.

TextEng: (sigh) I'd take you back to my bunk, handsome, but I don't think my seargent would let me keep you.
Text: (한숨) 잘생긴 양반, 내 침상으로 끌고 가고 싶지만 상관이 가만둘 것 같진 않네.

TextEng: You look like a take charge kind of guy. You here to search for those Words of Power I heard about?
Text: 주도적으로 움직이는 타입처럼 보이는데. 소문에 듣던 그 권능의 언령을 찾으러 온 건가?

TextEng: My, my. Hello there, handsome. You come to save us from the big, bad Luskan army?
Text: 어머나. 안녕하세요, 멋진 분. 러스칸의 못된 대군으로부터 우릴 구하러 온 거예요?

TextEng: You're a sight for a soldier's sore eyes, miss. Most of them other female mercenaries ain't got much going in the way of looks.
Text: 병사 눈 호강 좀 시켜주시네, 아가씨. 다른 여자 용병들은 외모가 썩인 경우가 많거든.

TextEng: Nothing like a pretty lady to remind us soldiers what we're fighting for before we ship off to the front.
Text: 전선으로 나가기 전에, 우리가 무엇을 위해 싸우는지 상기시켜 주는 데 예쁜 숙녀만 한 게 없지.

TextEng: Hello there, miss. What's a pretty gal like you doing in this stinkhole of a camp?
Text: 안녕하세요, 아가씨. 이런 악취 나는 야영지에 어쩐 일로 예쁜 분이?

TextEng: I'm glad you <race> folk are standing with us against Luskan. We need all the help we can get.
Text: 러스칸에 맞서 우리 편에 선 <race> 분들이 있어 다행이야. 도움은 많을수록 좋아.

TextEng: Another <race> mercenary in camp? Gend must be paying you guys a fortune.
Text: 야영지에 또 다른 <race> 용병이라? 겐드가 너희한테 돈을 꽤나 퍼붓는군.

TextEng: Another <race> type wandering about? You'd think after what Aribeth did they'd be more careful with relying on you non-humans.
Text: 또 다른 <race>가 어슬렁거리네? 아리베스 경 일 이후로 비인간 종족을 덜 의지할 줄 알았더니.

TextEng: A word of warning to a fellow <race> - since Aribeth's betrayal people around here ain't too fond of us non-humans.
Text: 같은 <race>로서 한마디 충고-아리베스 경의 배신 이후로 이 근처 사람들, 우리 같은 비인간 종족을 곱게 안 봐.

TextEng: Good to see another <race> face around here. We've got to stick together if we want to beat those Luskan dogs!
Text: 여기서 <race> 얼굴을 또 보니 반갑네. 러스칸 놈들을 이기려면 우리끼리 뭉쳐야지!

TextEng: I didn't expect to see another <race> in these parts. You here to look for them Words of Power.
Text: 이 근처에서 또 다른 <race>를 볼 줄이야. 너도 그 권능의 언령을 찾으러 온 거지.

TextEng: This place is crawling with barbarians and Uthgardt. You're probably a pagan savage, too, ain't you?
Text: 여긴 야만인하고 우스가르트로 득실대. 너도 아마 이교도 야만인이겠지, 안 그래?

TextEng: Shouldn't you be up on the plateau with the Uthgardt? We don't much like barbarians here in the camp.
Text: 너라면 고원 위 우스가르트랑 있어야 하는 거 아냐? 우리 야영진은 야만인들을 그다지 좋아하지 않아.

TextEng: Geez, another barbarian in our camp. As if those Uthgardt savages aren't bad enough.
Text: 젠장, 야영지에 또 야만인이군. 우스가르트 야만인들만으로도 질리는데.

TextEng: You gonna use your crystal ball to find those Words of Power for Aarin Gend? Hah!
Text: 수정구로 아린 겐드를 위해 그 권능의 언령을 찾을 참이야? 하!

TextEng: You spell casters ain't too popular among the soldiers' barracks. They ain't forgot that Luskan is run by mages!
Text: 마법사들은 병사 막사에서 인기 없지. 러스칸을 마법사들이 지배한다는 걸 아직도 잊지 못하거든!

TextEng: Keep your distance. If we can't even trust a paladin like Aribeth, how can we trust you spellcaster types?
Text: 딱 붙지 마. 아리베스 경 같은 성기사도 못 믿게 됐는데, 마법사 너희를 어떻게 믿겠어?

TextEng: You're a holy <man/woman>, aren't you? I'm shipping to the Luskan front tomorrow - say a prayer for me.
Text: 성직자 맞지? 난 내일 러스칸 전선으로 나가-날 위해 기도 좀 해줘.

TextEng: I know the paladin Aribeth betrayed us all, but I still have faith in you holy types.
Text: 성기사 아리베스 경이 우릴 모두 배신한 건 알지만, 그래도 성직자 분들에 대한 믿음은 있어.

TextEng: Good to see some holy folk around here. You gonna do something about them pagan Uthgardts on the plateau?
Text: 여기서 성직자들을 보니 든든하네. 저 고원의 이교도 우스가르트들은 좀 어떻게 해줄 건가?

TextEng: Hey, what's wrong with you mercenaries? Always waving your weapons all over the place!
Text: 이봐, 용병들 뭐가 문제야? 왜 맨날 여기저기서 무기를 휘둘러 대는 거지!

TextEng: Looks like you're ready to head out in search of the traitor Aribeth - you're armed and everything!
Text: 배신자 아리베스 경을 찾으러 나갈 준비가 다 된 모양이네-완전 무장까지 하고!

TextEng: Hey, the camp is safe. No need to wave your weapons about here. Save that for the battle front.
Text: 이 야영지는 안전해. 여기서 무기 휘둘 필요 없어. 전선에서나 그러라고.

TextEng: So what do you think about Aribeth's betrayal of Neverwinter? Ah, why am I asking an idiot like you?
Text: 아리베스 경의 네버윈터 배신에 대해 어떻게 생각해? 하, 왜 너 같은 바보한테 묻고 있지?

TextEng: This camp is a mess! Uthgardt savages up on the plateau and morons wandering the streets.
Text: 이 야영지는 엉망진창이야! 고원에는 우스가르트 야만인들, 거리에는 등신들이 헤매고.

TextEng: Not too bright, are you? Ah well, I guess we need all the help we can get to beat those Luskan dogs.
Text: 그다지 똑똑하진 않네, 그치? 뭐, 러스칸 개자식들을 이기려면 있는 도움은 다 필요하니.

TextEng: You're bleeding like a stuck pig. You run into some Luskan soldiers serving that traitor Aribeth?
Text: 돼지라도 잡은 것처럼 피를 흘리네. 배신자 아리베스 경 밑의 러스칸 병사들하고 부딪쳤어?

TextEng: You're pretty banged up. You just come back from the Luskan battle lines?
Text: 꼴이 말이 아니네. 방금 러스칸 전선에서 돌아온 거야?

TextEng: Those wounds look terrible! Better get Neurik to check them out at the temple.
Text: 상처가 끔찍하군! 사원에서 뉴릭에게 진찰받는 게 좋겠어.

TextEng: Gend must be desperate if he's hiring people who can't even dress themselves.
Text: 옷도 제대로 못 챙겨 입는 사람까지 고용하다니, 겐드가 절박하긴 한가 보네.

TextEng: You can't run around the camp with nothing on! Are you mad?
Text: 알몸으로 야영지 돌아다니면 안 돼! 미쳤어?

TextEng: Put some decent clothing on! You're as bad as those Uthgardt savages!
Text: 옷 좀 제대로 걸쳐! 우스가르트 야만인들만큼이나 꼴이 엉망이야!

TextEng: Commoner
Text: 평민
